name: Squalane + Marine Algae Eye Cream for Fine Lines & Dark Circles
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is: A powerful eye cream that instantly firms and lifts, visibly brightens, and smooths the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles around the eye area..Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dark Circles..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:- Paracress Extract: Quickly smooths and firms the look of skin..- Pink Marine Algae: Visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles..- Sugarcane-Derived Squalane: Weightlessly locks in essential moisture...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Our award-winning eye cream pairs the power of marine algae and paracress extract for maximum efficacy to naturally relax the look of fine lines and instantly firm and lift. This eye cream's whipped texture melts in on contact to deliver deep hydration and leave behind a perfect canvas for makeup...Clinical Results: In a 28-day clinical study of 33 female subjects (ages 35 to 60), after 1 use:.- 97% showed improvement in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.- 97% agreed the skin around their eyes appeared firmer..In a 28-day consumer study of 33 female subjects (ages 35 to 60), with twice-daily use, after 1 week:.- 94% saw a visible lift in the eye area.- 94% agreed the look of their dark circles improved..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Paracress Extract: Quickly smooths and firms the look of skin..-Pink Marine Algae: Visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles..-Sugarcane-Derived Squalane: Weightlessly locks in essential moisture....Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Glycerin, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Olivate, Jojoba Esters, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Panthenol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Cetyl Palmitate, Spilanthes Acmella Flower Extract, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Sorbitan Palmitate, Dunaliella Salina Extract, Astaxanthin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Citric Acid....The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For best results, use after cleansing and before serums and moisturizers..-Gently apply cream to entire eye area using your ring finger..-Massage around eye, out to temple and underneath the browbone (can be used on eyelids)..-Use twice daily, morning and night..-Pair with Biossance’s Squalane + Peptide Brightening & De-Puffing Eye Gel (sold separately) for maximum benefits...Recycling Instructions:.-Remove and dispose of cap..-Empty and rinse remaining product from jar..-Place in curbside recycling..-The outer carton is made from sustainable, FSC-certified sugarcane paper and can be placed in curbside recycling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for fine lines. Just the right moisture for a youthful look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the mini one first, after the first application I fell in love with it, the texture and creaminess really helped and nourished my aging eyes. So I purchased the larger one
